description: the details in this app are phenomenal

Some elements like inserting a table make the application crush on kubuntu 18.04
Great app. Thanks.
Awesome! I could not get the .deb or Snap package to work due to dependencies. Merci beaucoup!

I am very new with Linux / Ubuntu and could not get it to work; but the guide from flathug finally got the job done.

Links below:

https://flathub.org/apps/details/ch.openboard.OpenBoard
https://flatpak.org/setup/Ubuntu/

Once I setup the flatpak as described and launched the installer, it took some time to start but finally got the job done.

Thanks a million to all those out there to help us.

Cheers !
summary: Finally works with flathub.org Ubuntu 20.04 LTS

description: You can annotate on the board, on the desktop, erase with area eraser, erase by selecting paths, take screenshots and add them to the board, move stuff around, set a background grid, among other tasks.
the best zzzzzzzzzzzzz
summary: finnally it's work thaank you for this great app

description: It works fine, but it can still be improved (for example, moving with touch). They mostly don't accept feature requests due to lack of resources
This app is amazing, very stable and lots of functionality. There is not a better alternative out there, open source or closed source/propietary.
summary: The best open piece of software i've ever seen yet

description: My school uses this software. Very useful, would reccomend!
It is very annoying to use in any multimonitor setup, it forces itself into fullscreen. If you want to multitask while having a whiteboard app, this is certainly not the one to use.
crashes after i start writing, terrible
I use pen tablet and when I hover on my tab it is not showing where is the cursor, it is hard to tell where is my pen at on the screen. BAD
summary: Cursor not showing when using Pen Tablet
